test_cases.title: Login successful with valid credentials

steps.description: Open the application and navigate to the login page
Enter valid email address and password
Verify that you are logged in to your account successfully

test_cases.expected_result: You are now logged in to your account and can access it

test_cases.title: Login failed due to invalid credentials

steps.description: Open the application and navigate to the login page
Enter invalid email address and password

test_cases.expected_result: You are not logged in to your account due to invalid credentials

test_cases.title: Login failed due to empty fields

steps.description: Open the application and navigate to the login page
Enter an empty email address and password

test_cases.expected_result: You are not logged in to your account due to missing required fields

test_cases.title: Login failed due to wrong password

steps.description: Open the application and navigate to the login page
Enter a valid email address and wrong password

test_cases.expected_result: You are not logged in to your account due to an incorrect password
